entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
